module.name: @MODULE_NAME@
module.author: HealthIT
module.description: Hospital core module, contains common api for EHR project in Kenya supported by USAID

globalProperty.description: Global obs group for a patient
This using when we show name of hospital
Age categories for patient and its ranges
Concept class id to tell a concept is for a medical examination.
Determination whether a patient should be associated with a doctor on the queue at OPD 0-get all, 1-get only assigned
